mapper.select: SELECT id, pass, name, nick, contry, year, gender, email, tel, address, myLike, profileImg, follower, joindate, kakao_id, naver_id FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, pass, name, nick, contry, year, gender, email, tel, address, myLike, profileImg, follower, joindate, kakao_id, naver_id FROM member WHERE kakao_id = #{kakaoId}
SELECT id, pass, name, nick, contry, year, gender, email, tel, address, myLike, profileImg, follower, joindate, kakao_id, naver_id FROM member WHERE id = #{userId} AND pass = #{userPw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( id, pass, name, nick, contry, year, gender, email, tel, address, myLike, profileImg, follower, joindate, kakao_id, naver_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pass}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{contry}, #{year}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{myLike}, #{profileImg}, #{follower}, #{joindate}, #{kakao_id}, #{naver_id} )
